text: Russell David Johnson (November 10, 1924 - January 16, 2014) was an American television and movie actor. He was best known as "The Professor" on the CBS television sitcom Gilligan's Island. Johnson died at his home in Bainbridge Island, Washington on January 16, 2014. He died from kidney failure. He was 89 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Russell Johnson Interview with the Archive of American Television Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Washington (state)
title: Russell Johnson
